title.narrative: 2014 African Leaders of Tomorrow Scholarship Program (in honour of Nelson Mandela and in collaboration with DFATD)

description.narrative: The Program will provide promising, young professionals from Sub-Saharan Africa with high quality academic and professional training in Canada. Support for Masters level study will be combined with exposure to Canadian public sector best practices in governance, public policy, and administration. Through the Program, graduates will be prepared to take on leadership roles in the areas of social development, fiscal and economic management, international trade, and the business regulatory environment within the African government sector.
